properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 18 at 3:34AM EST until January 18 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, southwest winds 30 to 40 knots with
gusts up to 50 knots and waves 7 to 10 feet expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, southeast winds 15 to 25 knots with gusts
up to 35 knots and waves 2 to 4 feet expected.

* WHERE...Lake Erie nearshore waters from Avon Point to
Willowick OH.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 PM this afternoon to 10 AM
EST Sunday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 PM EST this
afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY
